segments.text: He asked me if I'd like to be a newspaper salesperson ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are still student so I don't think you should have time for that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry about that . He said I can do that at spare time . Anyway , it's just a part-time job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , then . What kind of newspaper he wants you to sell ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a weekly newspaper named Olympic English . So I need to be here only on Sunday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds interesting . Especially that we are Olympic Volunteers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's exactly what I am thinking about , And also it's a good way to get social experiences .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And a good way to get some pocket money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll say yes . Wait a minute . I need an IC card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For what ? You have a telephone at home , don't you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but I don't want my Mom to tap my phone when I call Clive .
segments.speaker: S1
